TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Kerbal Stock Launcher Overhaul (6/6/16 More parts and improvements)

Articles.Content:
Sorry to ask a noob question, but how do you use the fairings with this pack? I have the base but nothing to put on it? do i need to download a separate mod or have these parts not been released yet?

Great mod absolutely love it!

The base is designed for use with the Procedural Fairings add-on.

Hearing good things about what I am doing is a massive boost of my morale

Then I too should strengthen it by saying that I also really like your work! It's good news that you have started working on a new engine as well (the KE-4). The more stock-like parts the better. Especially engines.

@WASMIC Thanks, Enjoying this mod so much now

@Blackheart612 Your mod is amazing honestly keep it up the parts look as if they belong in Stock Kerbal!
Thanks guys. I'm currently recalling my plans for this mod because it's messed up in my head. I'll get back to it once I get my mind back to it.

well for the time being it makes a very perfect Delta 4 rocket with your ICPS:

http://imgur.com/a/eeasu#0

Cool! What did you use for the SRBs?

Cool! What did you use for the SRBs?

Those look like procedural SRBs
yeah they are procedural parts SRBs

So I found what it is to be the equivalent of the RT-10 SRB rather than just the cut off Shuttle SRB. A compacted version of H-IIB's SRB-A. I tested a Strap-on Guard as well, it looks neat. The strap-on guard is removable and the mission flag as well. Nosecones sold separately.

Here's the upcoming new launcher, still using the old resized Upper stage from Kerbal X, I will find an engine for it soon.

Click on the image if you want to have a closer look.

Edited February 16, 2015 by blackheart612

I have to ask if they are RO compatible.

Thanks,

Astrofox

So I found what it is to be the equivalent of the RT-10 SRB rather than just the cut off Shuttle SRB. A compacted version of H-IIB's SRB-A. I tested a Strap-on Guard as well, it looks neat. The strap-on guard is removable and the mission flag as well. Nosecones sold separately.

http://i.imgur.com/OoH1FKK.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/jGAlLvl.png

Looks good. I've been looking for a stockalike RT-10 replacement for quite some time, and this definitely fits the bill!

I have to ask if they are RO compatible.

Thanks,

Astrofox

Unfortunately, I don't make parts for RO, but with, permissions, somebody can get the parts for RO with the right size.

Looks good. I've been looking for a stockalike RT-10 replacement for quite some time, and this definitely fits the bill!

I'm glad you like it

Meanwhile I added FX for the new part, Z-map satellite launch kit now launches with style. I also added Texture switch, with yellow stripe and without, with rugged variants.
Everytime i come back to this thread i wet my pants. *insert grabby hands*

While you're at the exhaust effects, could you take a look at the old ones? They're very slow, considering that they should be moving at several kilometers per second. Take a look at the exhaust from the stock SRBs, it's much faster. As much as I like your effects, they're simply too slow and actually break suspension of disbelief for me.

Everytime i come back to this thread i wet my pants. *insert grabby hands*

I hope it continues doing so... if that's a good thing that is.

While you're at the exhaust effects, could you take a look at the old ones? They're very slow, considering that they should be moving at several kilometers per second. Take a look at the exhaust from the stock SRBs, it's much faster. As much as I like your effects, they're simply too slow and actually break suspension of disbelief for me.

I believe I have started removing my smoke effects or is it on Aerojet Kerbodyne? Correct me if I'm wrong.
like what I see...though I don't really use stock parts anymore

like what I see...though I don't really use stock parts anymore

My mod is independent of stock parts, you can use it without any of it, but if you are concerned about the theme, it's really themed to be stock-alike
That's fair, I realized the stockalike stats as soon as I posted!

I believe I have started removing my smoke effects or is it on Aerojet Kerbodyne? Correct me if I'm wrong.

It's not the smoke effects that are too slow, it's the flame effects. Is there any way to speed them up in the cfg file, or does it have to be done in the animation?

It's not the smoke effects that are too slow, it's the flame effects. Is there any way to speed them up in the cfg file, or does it have to be done in the animation?

I believe that the animation speed is only changeable before import but that's a thing that I'm not 100% sure about as I'm not that good with configs. I'll patch that up for you once I get to it.

Meanwhile, I just added an engine that isn't designed to be a replacement for any of the Squad Parts but I really like it. I don't know what stats to give it yet but I plan this to be a first stage engine with no fairings and no bottom nodes.

Better Pic:
oooo... yes. you can make it a RD-180ish first stage booster!

Yes it is indeed based on RD-180, that is why I am obliged to name it KE-180. Reason was I am overusing LV-T(number here) too much now, time to use KE. That's gonna be some work to unwrap and texture. For the meantime, I'll try finding a thing to replace LV-909 in service.
FINALY!!!!!!!!! An RD-180 with the engine cover! Man hats off and im not wearing a hat, thats awesome Cant wait!
You should make a guide what parts this mod replaces so I can remove them to save memory.
The engine (without the fairings) looks like an LR-87. We can use it to do a Titan replica!

You should make a guide what parts this mod replaces so I can remove them to save memory.

My parts are stand alone, not a replacement. You can delete the parts you don't like and their folders are named as they would be in game. Mostly.

The engine (without the fairings) looks like an LR-87. We can use it to do a Titan replica!

I didn't notice, I didn't like LR-87 that much. Of course when I start to have some time to develop again, I will have to finish this model, then in a release in the future, you can do whatever you want
